info.name: FairArena API v1 - Complete
info.description:
# FairArena API Reference

Complete API documentation for FairArena platform.

## Base URLs
| Environment | URL |
|-------------|-----|
| Production | `https://fairarena.app` |
| Development | `http://localhost:3000` |

## Authentication
Most endpoints require Clerk JWT authentication:
```
Authorization: Bearer <clerk_jwt_token>
```

## Rate Limiting
- Standard: 100 req/min
- Auth endpoints: 10 req/min
- OTP: 3 req/24hr
